name: Teamleader Focus
description:
Invoices, quotes, CRM, project management and planning: manage your business easily in one place with Teamleader Focus.

Make use of the most powerful features on the mobile app and run your business from anywhere:

- Access and update contact details in your CRM.
- Stay on top of payments, create invoices and quotations.
- Maintain a clear overview of your tasks, meetings and calls.
- Track time, create digital work orders, and manage resources.
